DataInput._comment: ----------Model variables----------
Intracellular glucose concentration, mM
Intracellular ATP concentration, mM
Plasma GLP1 concentration, pM
GLP1R activity, -
intracellular cAMP concentration, mM
Intracellular Ca concentration, mM
Insulin secretion rate of the beta cell, pM min^{-1}
----------Model parameters----------
Correlation between the concentration of glucose and ATP, -
Percentage of unconsumed ATP between adjacent timeslices, -
Coefficient for GLP1 activating GLP1R, pM^{-1}
Coefficient for cAMP production through ATP, -
Coefficient for cAMP production through GLP1R activation, -
Percentage of unconsumed cAMP between adjacent timeslices, -
Correlation between the concentration of cAMP and Ca, -
Percentage of unconsumed Ca between adjacent timeslices, -
Coefficient for Ca facilitating insulin secretion, pM min^{-1} mM^{-1}
----------Parameters for the model inferences----------
Scale for the minimum covariance in the model
Time slices to sample
